ResourceHeader.Description: Ground-based vector magnetic field at Narsarsuaq, Greenland, 20 s, THEMIS GBO Network, Higher latitude chain (Lat 61.2, Long 314.6). Station Code: NRSQ.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Hans Gleisner, Danish Meteorological Institute, Lyngbyvej 100, DK-2100 Copenhagen.

NumericalData.Keyword: CDF Global Attribute DISCIPLINE: Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
CDF Global Attribute DISCIPLINE: Space Physics>Ionospheric Science
CDF Global Attribute DATA_TYPE: MAG>Magnetic Field
CDF Global Attribute GENERATED_BY: THEMIS SOC
CDF Global Attribute RULES_OF_USE: Acknowledgement: Magnetometer data provided by: Hans Gleisner, Danish Meteorological Institute.

Parameter.Name: B in HDZ Components
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_nrsq_epoch
Parameter.Description: Magnetic field B in HDZ vector components

Parameter.Name: H component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_nrsq_epoch
Parameter.Description: H component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_nrsq.

Parameter.Name: D component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_nrsq_epoch
Parameter.Description: D component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_nrsq.

Parameter.Name: Z component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_nrsq_epoch
Parameter.Description: Z component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_nrsq.

Parameter.Name: thg_mag_nrsq_epoch
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function COMP_THEMIS_EPOCH with the following input parameters: thg_mag_nrsq_epoch0, thg_mag_nrsq_time.
